Title: Complete Itemization of meepo & standard skill build: By Rat

ItemTooltips.blink: errbudy get up, its time to slam now. we got a real jam going down
ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: Your feeling terrible at everything and cant last hit worth a shit.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Get this if you plan to finish treads fast as fuck
ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Great to keep you not dead early on in heavy right click lanes
ItemTooltips.staff_of_wizardry: Dude this is not worht the bag space, get to finish aghanims tho
ItemTooltips.ultimate_orb: Dude stats are good and you can build this into scythe or SKADOO BABY
ItemTooltips.gem: Fuck everything you cant see, and their mom.
ItemTooltips.dust: Look for shadow blades & sucure this even if other people are carrying.
ItemTooltips.bottle: So I hear you want to mid lane meepo.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: You can spend some of that dosh on map awareness to yknow
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Uhm... dont buy these unless you need to deward hard or brood is being a cunt
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Carry this or you are a fat gold hoarder who isnt trying to win.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Meepo evolves into Mapo, you now have complete and total map control.
ItemTooltips.eagle: Heavy right click focus on the other team and from you.
ItemTooltips.reaver: Fuck spells, get health, make money, attract bitches.
ItemTooltips.point_booster: *cough* meepos dont share point booster *cough* baddie get last. jk you can go point booster first, but its hard to get at a time that does not impact your farm.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Didn't miss a single last hit in the first 5 minutes of game?
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Let treebeard get this, meepo is a carry dude.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Missing on your team and you want early rosh presence.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: If you think you are going to build a vlads go ahead and finish one of these in lane, otherwise stick to tranqs.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Magic sucks, antimage was right all along.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: FUCK CARRIES AND YOUR TEAM SUX
ItemTooltips.assault: well if no one else gets it... and you have the cash... and the other carry or carries dont have downs and look like hobos...
ItemTooltips.manta: Idk know what you would do with this but the stats are nice and you can blink to illusions lol...
ItemTooltips.armlet: End the game in the next 5 minutes with this or its a waste of gold, build only after heart unless you are mad micro god.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: How did you even press all the other 30 keys? use to disable hard right clickers & fuck their day
ItemTooltips.orb_of_venom: A very nice touch to ganking power early in the game.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: If you can't really farm and need to group early build this for your team if needed.
